item.title: HowDescribedIs
item.description: CW21 Hack Day - 2021-03-31 to 2021-04-01 Hopper-1949 - HP12-CW21 Hack Day idea proposer Faruk Diblen, Daniel Garijo, Carlos Martinez, Mathew Bluteau, Paddy McCann Slack: #howdescribedis Idea name (provisional) HowDescribedIs Further automation of howfairis Context and/orÂ research domain howfairis is a tool to measure level of adherence to the five recommendations on fair-software.eu website. It allows users to automatically check the compliance of their code and produce a badge displaying the score of their software.
